description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bq3ao","text":"This protocol describes expression and purification procedures for obtaining human recombinant autophagy E2-like enzyme ATG3 (ATG, AuTophaGy-related protein) of the ATG8 ubiquitin-like conjugation system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

fork_info.title: Expression and purification protocol of Homo sapiens E2-like enzyme ATG3

creator.name: Dorotea Fracchiolla
creator.affiliation: Sascha Martens lab, University of Vienna, Max Perutz Labs - Vienna (AT)

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"9uqrk","text":"General information","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hc07","text":"Insert: Homo sapiens ATG3, NP_071933.2; Expression system: E.Coli Rosetta pLyss; plasmid origin: Sascha Martens Lab, Addgene 169079, lab internal construct database number SMC861; backbone: pET-Duet1; plasmid resistance: Ampicillin; tags \u0026 cleavage sites: N-term 6xHis, followed by Tobacco Etch Virus (TEV) cleavage site, ATG3 ORF. Ext coeff: 45840 M-1 cm-1 , MW 35.8 kDa.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":8,"length":12},{"style":"italic","offset":59,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: A PI3K-WIPI2 positive feedback loop allosterically activates LC3 lipidation in autophagy - Published in 10.1083/jcb.201912098
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"bknht","text":"Materials and Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmo0e","text":"Escherichia coli Rosetta pLyss cells","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s8i4","text":"Luria Bertani (LB) medium with antibiotics (final conc. 50µg/ml Ampicillin, 34µg/ml Chloramphenicol)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1psi4","text":"IPTG (isopropyl-b-d-thiogalactopyranoside)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4i7jv","text":"37°C shaker incubator","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52mqf","text":"sterile flasks/sterile pipettes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9afjs","text":"tip sonicator","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1v3cu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aok4l","text":"Lysis Buffer: 50mM Hepes pH=7.5; 300mM NaCl, 10mM Imidazole, 2mM MgCl2, 2mM β-mercaptoethanol, 1mM Pefablock, Complete Protease Inhibitors (EDTA-free CIP tablet, Roche), DNAse (Sigma). ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13},{"style":"sub","offset":69,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2vnt","text":"Buffer A: 50mM Hepes pH=7.5, 300mM NaCl, 10mM Imidazole (filtered and degassed) + 1mM β-mercaptoethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fom6q","text":"Buffer B: 50mM Hepes pH=7.5, 300mM NaCl, 300mM Imidazole (filtered and degassed) + 1mM β-mercaptoethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36hfj","text":"Size Exclusion Chromatography (SEC) Buffer: 25mM Hepes pH=7.5, 150mM NaCl (filtered and degassed) + 1mM DTT (Dithiothreitol)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jttc","text":"Note: all purification buffers are filtered and degassed. Reducing agents (β-mercaptoethanol and Dithiothreitol) are added after degassing step.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rb04","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ti1s","text":"Columns: - NiNTA resin ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dan8a","text":"                    - S75_16/60 (GE Healthcare)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5adhc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7edci","text":"Gels: 10% SDS-PAGE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

{"blocks":[{"key":"a1h7i","text":"Pellet cells at   in a Sorvall RC6+ centrifuge (Thermo Scientific), discard supernatant and resuspend pellets in ice cold lysis buffer (25 ml/1 lt culture).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"67ge4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"4000","duration":900,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7A55CB4097E511EB8F963F27E9263A8C","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1k2tl","text":"Flash freeze resuspended pellets in liquid nitrogen and store at   until purification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bj1tp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9735C30097E511EB8F963F27E9263A8C","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c8srs","text":"Cleave His tag overnight with TEV protease in dialysis against buffer containing 0mM Imidazole.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
